The plans and promises of the Key System were just as advanced and enthusiastic as those promoted todayby BART.But it only took eight years to build the Key System.BART may need 11. 
The companywas backed byFrancis Marion“Borax” Smith,who came to Oakland before the turn of the century aftermaking a fortune in the borax business. 
Smith quickly began gaining control of local trolley lines and planned to build a gigantic empire of transit,property and utilitycompanies.His Realty Syndicate combine was one of the largestlandowners in Alameda County.
